page.title: 03Bilborough:Where I live
page.content: The area I live in is Bilborough.It has a park,a few shops and a pub.The pub is called The Pelican.There is another pub in Strelley which I go to,called the Broad Oak.The houses in Bilborough are semi-detached,similar to the houses of Strelley and Trowell.There is a school up the road called Melbury.It used to be an infant school but now it is a primary school.Nearby is Bilborough College and the William Sharp Comprehensive School.They are making a new road through Strelley.Nearby there are fields for horses to graze in and there is a lot of wildlife.I have seen rabbits and squirrels.
